activities.loc: JCB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeremy L Best

records.addlTxt:
From $1000.00 cash bond to $500.00 cash bond.  

Note:  Judge Bitney stated in court 10/19/22 that an amended bond did NOT need to be prepared or signed by the Defendant; just $500.00 cash bond returned to the person who posted it.

10:47 AM Attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jeremy L Best appeared by video.  Attorney Kaitlin Elizabeth Dippolito in court for Jeremy L Best for today only.
Attorney Dippolito relates Defendant qualifies for public defender, but will hire his own attorney.  Defendant relates and waives formal reading of the complaint and waives time limits, but Court relates and wants counsel to advise the court to preserve all rights. State relates.  Court resets AIA before Judge Babler.  Address and phone number confirmed.  Defendant requests signature bond.  State relates.  Court reduces $1000.00 cash bond to $500.00 cash bond and $500.00 cash bond returned to whomever posted.  NEW BOND DOES NOT NEED TO BE SIGNED.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 

Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages. 
May not go onto any premises where alcohol is sold. 
Must not possess any firearms.
Must have court permission for him to leave Wisconsin.

1:01 PM Defendant Jeremy L Best appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Alex Kitto appeared by video for Jeremy L Best, for today.
Court Reporter appeared by Zoom video means. 
Defendant needs to apply for PD.  
1:05 PM Attorney Kitto and DE in break out room. 
1:12 PM Attorney Kitto and DE back in court.
Attorney Kitto relates. 
Bond set. 
If bail is posted, DE must appear in person for next hearing.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Jeremy L Best
Current: 32 Camelot Lane #31, Rice Lake, WI 54868 United States  (Effective: 10-12-2022)
